settings.whatsapp.description: Beheer WhatsApp nummer koppelingen en webhook status
settings.whatsapp.mappings.title: Nummer Koppelingen
settings.whatsapp.mappings.description: Koppel Meta telefoonnummer ID's aan uw organisatie
settings.whatsapp.upsert.title: Nummer Toevoegen of Bijwerken
settings.whatsapp.upsert.label: Label
settings.whatsapp.health.title: Webhook Status
settings.whatsapp.seed.title: Snel Toevoegen
settings.whatsapp.seed.description: Voeg snel zakelijke en controle nummers toe
settings.whatsapp.onboard.title: WhatsApp Setup Wizard
settings.whatsapp.onboard.quickDescripti: Use our guided setup to configure WhatsApp in minutes.
settings.whatsapp.onboard.description: Set up WhatsApp integration in 4 simple steps
settings.whatsapp.onboard.prereqs.title: Prerequisites
settings.whatsapp.onboard.prereqs.descri: Before we can connect WhatsApp, you'll need to configure these webhook settings in your Meta Business Account
settings.whatsapp.onboard.prereqs.webhoo: Copy this URL and paste it as your webhook endpoint in Meta Business Manager
settings.whatsapp.onboard.prereqs.tokenH: Copy this token and use it as the verification token in Meta Business Manager
settings.whatsapp.onboard.numbers.title: Phone Number IDs
settings.whatsapp.onboard.numbers.descri: Enter your WhatsApp Business phone number IDs from Meta Business Manager
settings.whatsapp.onboard.numbers.busine: Main customer-facing WhatsApp number for receiving customer messages
settings.whatsapp.onboard.numbers.contro: Internal control number for administrative messages
settings.whatsapp.onboard.numbers.valida: Both phone number IDs are required
settings.whatsapp.onboard.test.title: Send Test Message
settings.whatsapp.onboard.test.descripti: Send a test message to verify your WhatsApp configuration is working
settings.whatsapp.onboard.test.phoneHelp: Enter your personal phone number to receive a test message (include country code)
settings.whatsapp.onboard.test.messageHe: Custom test message, or leave empty for default message
settings.whatsapp.onboard.done.title: Setup Complete!
settings.whatsapp.onboard.done.descripti: Your WhatsApp integration is now ready to use
settings.whatsapp.onboard.done.successDe: You can now receive and send WhatsApp messages through your plumbing business account.
